title: dragon timers turned off
body: Hi. The dragon timers are turned off in my game and I don't know why. Nothing there :(   please help

replies.body:
Whelp, that probably makes it really hard to time those dragon kills I bet. This might have something to do with your config files, so let's start by trying to reset those and see if the timers come back.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
- Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
- Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings

Hit me back if that doesn't help!
